#summary Overview of the Mahalo ParserFunctions project.
#labels Featured

This project is a collection of userful MediaWiki parser functions.  A [http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/ParserFunctions ParserFunction] is a special extension to MediaWiki which adds functionality to the wikitext language.

Currently there is just one function in this project:
 * ImageLink
 _More will be added as we think of them!_

Instructions on how to install Mahalo ParserFunctions can be found on the [Installation] page.
